\"Privacy Policy\" \"Summary of Privacy Policy"\ \"User Agreement\" \"Personal Information Collected\" \"Information Shared with Third Parties\" Privacy Policy Disclaimer User Agreement
Tencent Cloud Chat APP (\"this product\") is a test product provided by Tencent Cloud, and Tencent Cloud enjoys the copyright and ownership of this product. This product is only used for functional experience and must not be used for any commercial purposes. In order to comply with the regulatory requirements of relevant departments, any pornography, abusive, violent, and politically related content is strictly prohibited during use. Read and agree to the agreement first Welcome to Tencent Cloud Instant Messaging. To protect your personal information, we have updated the \"Privacy Policy\", involving improving the specific contents and purposes of collecting user information, and adding third-party SDKs.\n\n Please carefully read the \"User Agreement\",\"Summary of Privacy Policy\",\"Privacy Policy\",\"Personal Information Collected\" and \"Information Shared with Third Parties\", and tap Agree and Continue to use our products and services if you agree to them. Agree and Continue Disagree and Exit
An error occurred while getting the verification code. Refresh and try again. (%d)
Edit Group Name No nickname. Enter again. time out
Cleared unread messages successfully Failed to clear unread messages. %d, %s
Details Back
Message read status This feature is the flagship version feature If disabled, the message read status is hidden for all your messages and for all the messages sent by members in a chat. If enabled, the message read status is displayed for all your messages and for all the messages sent by members in a chat.
Choose Avatar
%s applies for access to the microphone In order for you to send voice messages, make camera and audio and video calls, and use the quick meeting function, please allow us to access the microphone. %s applies for camera permission In order for you to take photos or videos to send to friends, make video calls and use the quick meeting function, please allow us to access the camera. %s applies for storage permission In order for you to save photos and videos to your device, please allow us to write photos and videos to your device. Allow microphone access in Settings->Apps->%s to use voice messages, camera, audio and video calls and quick meeting functions normally Allow camera access in Settings->Apps->%s to use camera, video, video call and quick meeting functions normally Allow storage access in Settings->Apps->%s to use the function of saving photos and videos normally
Upgrade Show online status After it is turned off, you will not be able to see friends\' online or offline status prompts in the conversation list and address book. After it is turned on, you will be able to see your friends\' online or offline status prompts in the conversation list and address book. Online Status I got it No more reminders Ultimate Edition price description %s function is the Chat Ultimate Edition function, which can be used after purchasing the Ultimate Edition package. Please refer to the price description for details. This is the feature of ultimate edition
[Security Reminder] This App is only used to experience the features of Tencent Cloud Chat products, and cannot be used for business negotiation and expansion. Please do not trust remittance, winning the lottery and other information related to money, do not easily make strange phone calls, beware of being deceived. Report
Change Theme Select Style Instant Messaging Welcome to use this APP to experience Tencent Cloud Chat products and services Enter Chat Chat styles Theme Chat themes Welcome to Chat demo! You can try out various features such as sending text/emoji/rich media messages, checking message read status and friend relationship. You can also start one-to-one chats or group chats and manage groups with three no-replying bot friends equipped for you. 1 minute Run a demo in 1 minute with a few lines of code changes 10,000+ Over 10,000 customers per month 99.99% Over 99.99% messaging success rate and service reliability 1 billion+ Over 1 billion active users per month OK
